text: ninṟe rakṣitāv malakkukaḷkk bēādhanaṁ nalkiyirunna sandarbhaṁ (ōrkkuka.) ñān niṅṅaḷuṭe kūṭeyuṇṭ‌. atināl satyaviśvāsikaḷe niṅṅaḷ uṟappiccu nirttuka. satyaniṣēdhikaḷuṭe manas'sukaḷil ñān bhayaṁ iṭṭukeāṭukkunnatāṇ‌. atināl kaḻuttukaḷkk mīte niṅṅaḷ veṭṭikkeāḷḷuka. avaruṭe viralukaḷellāṁ niṅṅaḷ veṭṭikkaḷayukayuṁ ceyyuka
